attributes.action: give students 16-18 years £30 per week when they are in school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the school leaving age is raised to 18 years of age every student who is in school or college should be given £30 per week to enable themselves to buy what ever they need regardless of there parents income  
equal rights for all 16- 18 year olds
